Define Documentation

#define z_add ( c,
a,
b   ) 

Value:

{ (c)->r = (a)->r + (b)->r; \
                         (c)->i = (a)->i + (b)->i; }

#define z_eq ( a,
b   )     ( (a)->r == (b)->r && (a)->i == (b)->i )

#define z_sub ( c,
a,
b   ) 

Value:

{ (c)->r = (a)->r - (b)->r; \
                         (c)->i = (a)->i - (b)->i; }

#define zd_mult ( c,
a,
b   ) 

Value:

{ (c)->r = (a)->r * (b); \
                           (c)->i = (a)->i * (b); }

#define zz_mult ( c,
a,
b   ) 

Value:

{ \
        double cr, ci; \
        cr = (a)->r * (b)->r - (a)->i * (b)->i; \
        ci = (a)->i * (b)->r + (a)->r * (b)->i; \
        (c)->r = cr; \
        (c)->i = ci; \
    }
